results.name: Array read by antidiagonals: T(i,j) = number of different optimal difference triangle sets M(i,j).
comment: This array gives the number of different ways to choose the optimal difference triangle sets M(i,j) described in A234943.
link: J. B. Shearer, Difference Triangle Sets: Known optimal solutions.
J. B. Shearer, Difference Triangle Sets: Discoverers
example: The entries match those in A234943.
